channel.title: IPhone on Everything is Gray
channel.description: Recent content in IPhone on Everything is Gray

item.title: iDeals iPhone App
item.description: So I had the pleasure of meeting the gentleman that develops the iDeals iPhone application a few days ago. iDeals was designed to provide an easy to use interface for tracking deals from Amazon, EB Games, Buy.com, Woot!, etc. The iDeals app pulls its information from DODTracker.com servers, but is far more enjoyable than visiting the site itself. Best of all it’s free, go download it.
